data.title: Hotel Encanto Velasco, Matanzas. Book with Hotelsclick.com
data.meta_description: Situated in the main plaza of Matanzas, Hotel Encanto Velasco is located close to the famous Sauto theatre, the Pharmacy Museum and the Church of San Pedro de...
data.text: Situated in the main plaza of Matanzas, Hotel Encanto Velasco is located close to the famous Sauto theatre, the Pharmacy Museum and the Church of San Pedro de Versailles. The architecture of the structure is characterized by neoclassical elements like marble columns, granite and precious woods that make it one of the most prestigious buildings of the city. All elegant rooms are tastefully decorated and have modern amenities such as satellite TV, minibar, air conditioning, safe-deposit box. Enjoy the best of local and international cuisine at the restaurant of the Hotel Encanto Velasco. On the top floor of the Hotel Encanto Velasco you can enjoy great views of the city and the Bahia de Matanzas.
